name: Ann's Adventure
description:
Download this, and more math games, at https://www.teacherspayteachers.com/Store/Howlin-Husky-Math-Games

Please leave a comment! Whether it's good or bad, I appreciate it!

The lovable monster from Math- Tac- Toe, Ann, gets her own adventure! This math scrolling platformer helps students practice, while having fun. 

Students can practice adding and subtracting within 100 in this math game. Problems randomly generate using positive addition and subtraction problems (no negatives).

Features:

* A fully functional math platformer. Students control Ann with the arrow keys and jump with the space bar. Math problems and level order generate randomly. Every game is different!

* Help save the "Fuzzies". They've lost their way in the Wild Woods. Make sure to avoid the rest of the beasts in the woods.

* Score points by saving "Fuzzies" and answering math questions correctly.

* Music and sound effects make the game fun and interesting.

* I'm currently working on outfits! Get a free update where you can play with different outfits! Pirate Ann is currently finished but not available yet.

* Runs on Chromebooks and PC!

JavaScript must be enabled.

Running is EZ! Download and double click the html file. That's it! The game should open in your browser and function!

Give the file to your students for them to play!

If you see a game you like, but the skill you want isn't available, I can make a different copy. I can plug in/make any skill you can find on "Kuta".

Email me if you have any issues!! I'm happy to help.
